message: If you step on the flower in the top left, we'll do a little dance.
Normally I just stand still right here, but I'll move if you step on the flower in the top left.
Yeeeeaaaahhh, now we're on the right!!
Oh, and before you leave, I have just one thing to say.
Those foul, putrid, vile, stinking, rotten humans!
I'd get rid of them all if it were up to me!
You can be my fellow people-hater!
I'm a human, and so are you?
I don't believe it. You're disgusting!
